document.full_text: mark ingram has the kind of skills that not only made emmitt smith, ladainian tomlinson and edgerrin smith stars, but also gave them longevity and productivity as their physical gifts declined.
document.title: n.f.l. draft: mark ingram, top-ranked rusher
